org.pipservices.runtime

Interface IController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBusinessLogic, IComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractController

    public interface IController
extends IBusinessLogic
    Interface for microservice components that encapsulate business logic. These components are the most valuable for business and the key idea behind this framework is to protect them from changes in persistence, communication or infrastructure to ensure their long life.
    Since:
    2016-06-09
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Sergey Seroukhov

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.pipservices.runtime.IBusinessLogic

        execute, findCommand, getCommands, validate

      • Methods inherited from interface org.pipservices.runtime.IComponent

        close, configure, getDescriptor, getState, link, open
